alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Gulf and southwestern Franklin Counties through 900 AM EDT/800 AM CDT/... At 829 AM EDT/729 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Port St. Joe, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apalachicola, Port St. Joe, Nine Mile, Eleven Mile, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Tilton, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport and Simmons Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf
